meanings.sent1: The treasure map led us to an occulted cave filled with gold.
meanings.sent2: The magician performed an occulted trick that amazed the audience.
meanings.sent3: The cat's occulted hiding spot behind the curtains made us search the house for hours.
meanings.sent4: Her true feelings were like an occulted gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The moon's occulted side always remains a mystery to us.

meanings.sent1: The spy's occulted identity was revealed during the mission.
meanings.sent2: The ancient manuscript contained occulted knowledge about the lost civilization.
meanings.sent3: The surprise party was an occulted event until the very last moment.
meanings.sent4: His occulted intentions were finally brought to light by his actions.
meanings.sent5: The secret society held their meetings in an occulted location deep in the forest.

meanings.sent1: The stars were occulted by the thick clouds on that stormy night.
meanings.sent2: The ancient ruins were partially occulted by overgrown vegetation.
meanings.sent3: The detective's view of the crime scene was occulted by the crowd gathered around.
meanings.sent4: The truth was occulted by layers of deception and misinformation.
meanings.sent5: The mountain peak was occulted by mist, adding an air of mystery to the landscape.
